title: About
text:
Hello! I am Francesco Dâ€™Amico, a PhD student in Physics at Sapienza University of Rome, where I work under the supervision of Matteo Negri and Chiara Cammarota on the topic of statistical theory of learning.
My research lies at the intersection of statistical mechanics, machine learning, and complex systems.

title: About
text:
Research Interests

Data structure in machine learning and neural scaling laws.
Associative memories and attention-class architectures

Algorithms for approximate likelihoods in energy-based models

Optimization and inference in hard computational tasks
